entry.title: AymenSakouhi/proFile: **ProFile Lite** is a lightweight file upload and sharing app where authenticated users can upload files and share them via simple, secure links. This project is part of a learning stream to explore and implement modern web technologies in a hands-on way.

entry.title: teberzin/TavernCall: The purpose of TavernCall is to provide a lightweight and thematic online platform for tabletop role-playing game (TTRPG) players to find or create game groups. The website allows users to create temporary "signals" indicating their availability or interest in forming a group. Others can view these signals and reach out via Discord.
entry.content: The purpose of TavernCall is to provide a lightweight and thematic online platform for tabletop role-playing game (TTRPG) players to find or create game groups. The website allows users to create temporary "signals" indicating their availability or interest in forming a group. Others can view these signals and reach out via Discord.
